### Description
The output of this ticket will be a draft of the prototype for the [study name] study. The study focuses on [brief description of study]. 

#### Timeframe for this ticket
Timeframe depends on how the prototype is being built (content-only, Figma wireframe, HTML prototype, Staging prototype, etc.) and how complex it is. 

#### Output
[Add link when itâ€™s ready. Note status (in progress/final).]

### Tasks
- [ ] Create the prototype based on conversation guide
- [ ] Test prototype(s) against conversation guide and align
- [ ] Run beta test of conversation guide with prototype _(optional)_
- [ ] Share with HCD lead for review
- [ ] Incorporate feedback from HCD lead
- [ ] Share with UX enablement partner for review

### Acceptance criteria
- [ ] Draft prototype has been shared with UX enablement partner for review
